concept.title: Survey Settings
concept.shortdesc: You can specify whether a user group has access to Survey management or reporting. Users with the proper permission can generate reports on data collected from Survey. For example, you can run reports to see which surveys are associated with generating revenue, or you can see the performance of each survey compared to other surveys. You can see which surveys users are completing and which questions and responses are generating revenue.

ol.li: Click Analytics > Admin > Report Suites, then select a report suite.

conbody.p: See Configuring Adobe Survey in Survey Help.
